Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 100th overall pick, by Texas in 1973...
Injured on 8/3/1973 with a Spasms Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1975...
Injured on 6/21/1976 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 8/13/1976 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/19/1978 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 4/12/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1980, winning 2 games with a 2.51 ERA...
Injured on 6/8/1981 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 9/8/1982 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 5/24/1984 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Injured on 10/19/1986 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/4/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $4,123,456 per year...
Injured on 4/30/1988 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/10/1988 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1989, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
